atk_abil: Normal Attack: Knocks back enemies with a flurry of 6 consecutive attacks with his frozen axe.
Skill Attack: Spins his axe horizontally, attacking enemies with a whirlwind attack. The longer the axe spins, the higher the damage.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 5%, increases human movement speed by 3% and attack distance by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Innervate 3: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
Battle Cry (Elf): Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Knocks back enemies with a flurry of 8 consecutive attacks with his frozen axe
Skill Attack: Spins his axe horizontally, attacking enemies with a whirlwind attack. The longer the axe spins, the higher the damage.
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 10%, increases human movement speed by 6% and attack distance by 7%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Innervate 3: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
Battle Cry (Elf): Increases the attack, defense and HP of elf units in Guild Invasion even if Champion is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).

buffs.description: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Barbarian is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
